Attacks.Name: Ember
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Scratch
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Blaze
Superpowers.Effect: For the next attack, if Charmander has 2 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the strength of its next fire-type attack by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Flame Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: Charmander gains immunity to Burn conditions

Attacks.Name: Fire Fang
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Bleed special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Charmaleon character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
